doc:
Max Wagner https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Max_Wagner 0 Max Wagner (November 28, 1901 – November 16, 1975) was a Mexican-born American film actor who specialized in playing small parts such as thugs, gangsters, sailors, henchmen, bodyguards, cab drivers and moving men, appearing more than 400 films in his career, most without receiving screen credit. Newspaper gossip columnists noted his rise from playing "Gangster #4", with no lines, and not carrying a gun, to "Gangster #2", with both lines and a gun. Max_Wagner ( November_28_,_1901 – November_16_,_1975 ) was a_Mexican-born_American_film_actor who specialized in playing small_parts such_as thugs , gangsters , sailors , henchmen , bodyguards , cab_drivers and moving men , appearing more_than_400_films in his_career , most without receiving screen_credit . Newspaper_gossip_columnists noted his_rise from playing " Gangster_#_4_" , with no_lines , and not_carrying a_gun , to " Gangster_#_2_" , with both_lines and a_gun .
